name: Time-limited pushblocks
author: Alucard648
description: Time limited pushblocks. Push them all on triggers before they go boom. Straight from Goof Troop (SNES).
setup: 1.Set up solid combo with blank tile for CMB_TIMED_PUSHBLOCK_SOLID constant.2.Effect Width and Height used.  D0 - bracelet level requirement. D1 - allowed push directions. Add together - 1-up, 2-down, 4-left, 8-right. 0 for all directions. D2 - add together: 1 - gets stuck after 1 push, 2 - gets stuck when landing on trigger (disarms timer), 4 - icy block, continue moving in direction until hitting obstacle, 8 - ignore triggers, 16 - require triggers with same CSet as FFC`s  Cset. 32 - Start timer at screen init, 64 - don`t fail secrets on explosion on trigger 128 - superbomb explosion D3 - delay between frames, in frames, D4 - Number of frames D5 - Damage by explosion. 0 for simple vanish.
